channel.title: running on thomas strömberg
channel.description: Recent content in running on thomas strömberg

item.title: My first 15k
item.description: Yesterday, I ran further than I have ever run before: 15k (9.6mi). Today, my legs feel sore and stiff, as if I am walking around on knees made up of chipped pallasite. I trained for two months, but as you can see from the above chart, I only ran past the 7-mile range once. I can make all sorts of excuses as to why I didn’t train more, but a significant reason for it was pain.
